.. _util:

Additional Utilities
======================
The *util* module provides some useful utilities which are utilized within *eta_utility* but might be useful
for users of the library as well.

.. automodule:: eta_utility.util
    :members:
    :noindex:

Additional Utilities Julia Extension
---------------------------------------
The *util_julia* module provides some useful utilities which are utilized within *eta_utility* but might be useful
for users of the library as well.

.. automodule:: eta_utility.util_julia
    :members:
    :noindex:
